name: Video Guide for No Man's Sky - Chat & Cheats
name_original: Video Guide for No Man's Sky - Chat & Cheats
description: Download the exclusive chat and video guide for No Man's Sky Countdown for PS4 and PC Console.  Learn from the best No Man's Sky experts to survive the entire No Man's Sky universe.  All the walkthroughs, cheats, and shortcut guides to help you explore the game.  Meet members of the No Man's Sky community and create private chat conversations to share your secrets.  Be the first to watch each video guide as as soon as they are out.  Don't miss out!  Download the app today.
